author: Xerbutri
title: MD Landwehr B
intro: Visited during the summer 2004 expedition. The terrain is a bit smaller than Landwehr A. But there's much more to see. In march 2006 I paid an accidental revisit. Not much changed in the meanwhile, except the fences are in a poor state.
history: Unknown. The buildings are in a better state than the buildings of Landwehr A.
